items.title: Seaweed Salad
items.descript: Assorted sea greens, cucumber, green onions, sesame seeds, pea shoots, coconut aminos, and red chili.

items.title: Mediterranean Platter
items.descript: Pumpkin seed and spinach hummus, carrot falafel, cucumber and tomato salad, flax pita, and almond cheese-stuffed dates with local honey.

items.title: Crostinis with Carrot Caviar
items.descript: Flax and walnut crostinis, sage-infused almond and cashew cheese, and carrot caviar with red sea salt.

items.title: Pistachio Thyme Cheese
items.descript: Served with fresh berries, coconut butter crackers, and local honey.

items.title: Pad Thai
items.descript: Zucchini, red cabbage, carrot, green onions, bean sprouts, basil, mint, and kelp noodles with a tamarind and coconut sauce. Topped with crispy, lime-soaked almonds.

items.title: Tacos
items.descript: Chia and flax tortillas stuffed with mushroom, beet, and pumpkin seed meat, sunflower seed cheese, avocado, romaine lettuce, pea sprouts, and salsa verde. Nut-free.

items.title: Manicotti
items.descript: Coconut noodles filled with almond ricotta, fresh spinach, and basil. Topped with sun-dried tomato marinara and cashew parmesan.

items.title: Jackfruit Molé
items.descript: Savory jackfruit with tomato, onion, and green pepper. Served with house-made molé sauce, brown rice, avocado, coconut sour cream, and fresh salsa verde.

items.title: Mushroom Dumplings
items.descript: Stuffed with cashews, mushrooms, and spices. Steamed with assorted vegetables and wilted greens and served in a coconut, ginger, and turmeric broth. Topped with pea shoots and fresh herbs.

items.title: Zongzi
items.descript: Bamboo leaves stuffed with red rice, zucchini, cauliflower, carrots, and chickpeas. Steamed and served with avocado, fresh cucumber, and a black garlic and peanut sauce.  (Bamboo leaves are an aromatic and natural cooking device but are not meant to be eaten.)

items.title: Broccoli and Coriander Soup
items.descript: A thick and creamy soup served with sauteed spinach, cauliflower, green peas, brown rice, and almond cheese.

items.title: Creamy Pasta Salad
items.descript: Brown rice and quinoa pasta tossed with avocado, cucumber, tomato, chopped kale, spinach, and carrots. Served with a creamy coconut, parsley, and lemon dressing.

items.title: Chopped Kale Salad
items.descript: Finely chopped kale with broccoli, carrot, cabbage, water chestnuts, and chickpeas. Served with fresh basil, mint, and a sesame and ginger vinaigrette. Topped with crushed peanuts.

items.title: Orange Creamsicle Ice Cream Cake
items.descript: Served with tangerine coulis and whipped cashew cream.

items.title: Coconut Cream Cake
items.descript: Seasoned with vanilla and ginger. Topped with fresh strawberries and a strawberry sauce.

items.title: Chocolate Filled Chocolate
items.descript: Chocolate walnut cake filled with a rich chocolate cream.Topped with spicy cacao nibs and a raspberry, beet, and cinnamon sauce.

items.title: Lemon and Saffron Chia Pudding
items.descript: Served with fresh bananas, mango, and local honey. Nut-free.
